title: Trade
description: Defines a single trade offered by a villager or wandering trader.

tokens.text: exchanges items the villager wants for items the villager gives

fields.title: Wants
fields.description: Array of items the villager wants to receive from the player in exchange. Usually 1-2 items.

fields.title: Gives
fields.description: Array of items the villager gives to the player in exchange. Usually 1 item.

fields.title: Trader Experience
fields.description: Amount of experience the villager gains when this trade is used. Contributes to villager leveling up.

fields.title: Maximum Uses
fields.description: Maximum number of times this trade can be used before it becomes locked. Trade refreshes when villager restocks at workstation.

fields.title: Reward Experience
fields.description: Whether the player receives experience orbs when completing this trade.
